short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that filters out non-transparent images from search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"I HATE FAKE PNG" is a customizable browser extension that allows users to filter out non-transparent images from their search results when using specific words such as "png". This helps users save time and avoid deceptive images by only showing them the transparent images they need. 

User also can choose which search engines will be affected and what words will trigger the transparent filter.

Supported search engines:
- Google
- Bing
- Yandex
- DuckDuckGO
- Yahoo
